column2: "They were with the Darkers, so the Darkers must've dragged them along, but why damage the residential area?"
"I'd understand if they were targeting ARKS, but I don't understand the senseless destruction!"
"...what could be the reason... Maybe they're being manipulated? How sad if that's the case."
"I want to release them as quickly as possible, but I'm not that strong... So, I'm begging you!"
